When I am not surfing the web, ubuntu has yet to crash.  recently, I installed samba, and I got identicle crashes except right at the login scree
n.  Anyone have any idea what perhaps is causing this?

or box with less than 128M RAM

check your DNS settings then

if "freeezes" are tied to using external networks
fiest check if it relate to DNS. Give box enough time to sat "can't find someurl" or similar. If it does not say so for a couple of minutes, "freezes" likely are due to hardware.
if it's DNS check your /etc/resolv.conf if there are valid dns server addresses (check with your isp)
